channel.title: CVE Feed for AlayaCare -- Procura Portal
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AlayaCare -- Procura Portal

item.title: CVE-2023-6451|2024-07-26T15:05:18.750Z -- alayacare -- procura%20portal
item.description: Publicly known cryptographic machine key in AlayaCare's Procura Portal before 9.0.1.2 allows attackers to forge their own authentication cookies and bypass the application's authentication mechanisms.
